description: This file demonstrates how to use the ZepTools class to interact with memories stored in Zep, including initializing tools and agents, interacting with the agent, and refreshing context.

classes.name: ZepTools
classes.description: A class for interacting with Zep memory storage.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent that can interact with users.

classes.name: OpenAIChat
classes.description: A class representing the OpenAI chat model used by the agent.

methods.name: ZepTools.get_zep_memory
methods.description: Method to retrieve Zep memory of a specified type.

methods.name: Agent.print_response
methods.description: Method for the agent to output a response.
